message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair, right?
Let's be real, Alice. I'm losing money every round we wait. This offer is more than fair considering.
I'm willing to give you a little more this time, Bob, but I'm not going to be taken advantage of. Let's end this now.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. Take this offer before the money shrinks even more. It's my final offer.
